org.apache.flink.metrics

接口 Metric

  • 所有已知子接口:
    Counter, Gauge<T>, Histogram, Meter
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractFetcher.OffsetGauge, AbstractStreamOperator.LatencyGauge, CheckpointStatsTracker.CheckpointsCounter, CheckpointStatsTracker.CompletedCheckpointsCounter, CheckpointStatsTracker.FailedCheckpointsCounter, CheckpointStatsTracker.InProgressCheckpointsCounter, CheckpointStatsTracker.LatestCompletedCheckpointAlignmentBufferedGauge, CheckpointStatsTracker.LatestCompletedCheckpointDurationGauge, CheckpointStatsTracker.LatestCompletedCheckpointExternalPathGauge, CheckpointStatsTracker.LatestCompletedCheckpointSizeGauge, CheckpointStatsTracker.LatestRestoredCheckpointTimestampGauge, DownTimeGauge, DropwizardHistogramWrapper, DropwizardMeterWrapper, KafkaMetricMuttableWrapper, KafkaMetricWrapper, MeterView, MetricUtils.AttributeGauge, NumberOfFullRestartsGauge, RestartTimeGauge, SimpleCounter, TaskIOMetricGroup.InputBufferPoolUsageGauge, TaskIOMetricGroup.InputBuffersGauge, TaskIOMetricGroup.OutputBufferPoolUsageGauge, TaskIOMetricGroup.OutputBuffersGauge, TaskIOMetricGroup.SumCounter, TestMeter, UpTimeGauge

    public interface Metric
    Common super interface for all metrics.
